questions.userquestion: What type of boat did Miss Suzi have?
questions.author: Steamboat Annie
questions.notes: I'm wondering why, if I am an important part of the history of this question and did nothing more than have a bell to ring, why are the consequences so dire for me and not for Miss Suzi?

questions.userquestion: Why did the steamboat have a bell?
questions.author: Wring Mi Bell
questions.notes: As a concerned member of a long line of revered Bells, my grandfather - Liber T. Bell - is retired and currently living in Philadelphia, I have always wondered why so many amature poets tend to use such a horrifying concept coupled with our illustrous last name.

questions.userquestion: What really happened when Miss Suzi had a steamboat and the steamboat had a bell?
questions.author: Operator Oneringadingee
questions.notes: Many people call and ask me to give them number nine. There has NEVER been any phone number with just one digit, except 0 for Operator. Whenever someone asks me to give them number nine, I always tell them to go to a place that ryhmes with bell.

questions.userquestion: Is there an Operator abuse hotline?
questions.author: Ree F.R. Gerator
questions.notes: I have heard so many people threaten to cut off, well, it is unmentionable here, so let's just say it is a part of a human's anatomy... Anyway, I have heard the threat that if a caller is disconnected they will cut of this part of the operator's anatomy. I hope there are social services for threatened operators.
